RESOURCE.NAME: ANC Load XCES Standoff
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Add standoff annotations to an open document

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Document to be processed

PARAMETER.NAME: sourceUrl
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Location of the document containing standoff annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: standoffASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation set to add standoff tags to

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation type to be loaded. Required when loading a corpus

RESOURCE.NAME: ANC Load All GrAF Standoff

RESOURCE.NAME: ANC Save Content
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Save the textual content of a document to a text file

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to save

PARAMETER.NAME: destination
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The file to be written

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Character encoding for the file

RESOURCE.NAME: ANC Save XCES Standoff
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Saves annotations to a standoff file

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Document to save

PARAMETER.NAME: destination
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Location to write the file

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Set containing annotations to save

PARAMETER.NAME: standoffTags
PARAMETER.COMMENT: List of annoations types to be saved

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Character encoding to use when writing the file

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation type suffix to use when generating file names.

PARAMETER.NAME: namespace
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Namespace to use for the document

PARAMETER.NAME: version
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Version number assigned to the document

PARAMETER.NAME: schemaLocation
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Location of the schema for the namespace

RESOURCE.NAME: ANC Save XCES Corpus Standoff
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Saves annotations to a standoff file

PARAMETER.NAME: document

PARAMETER.NAME: destination

PARAMETER.NAME: standoffTags
PARAMETER.COMMENT: List of annoations types to be saved

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation type suffix to use when generating file names.

PARAMETER.NAME: namespace
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Namespace to use for the document

PARAMETER.NAME: version
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Version number assigned to the document

PARAMETER.NAME: schemaLocation
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Location of the schema for the namespace

PARAMETER.NAME: fileExtension
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Filename extension to be replaced with the annotation type and .xml suffix

PARAMETER.NAME: filterFeatures
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Feature names to be excluded from the output

RESOURCE.NAME: ANC Save GrAF Standoff
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Saves annotations to a standoff file

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Document to save

PARAMETER.NAME: destination
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Location to write the file

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Set containing annotations to save

PARAMETER.NAME: standoffTags
PARAMETER.COMMENT: List of annotations types to be saved

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Character encoding to use when writing the file

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation type suffix to use when generating file names.

PARAMETER.NAME: version
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Version number assigned to the document

PARAMETER.NAME: grafASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: AnnotationSet name used in the GrAF standoff header

PARAMETER.NAME: grafASType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Type URI for the GrAF annotation set.

PARAMETER.NAME: grafDefaultASType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Default type URI for the other annotation sets encountered.
